name: 01 - Inspect raw taxi trip csv files

content.query:
/* inspect raw taxi trip data */
SELECT TOP 5
    VendorID
    ,tpep_pickup_datetime
    ,tpep_dropoff_datetime
    ,passenger_count
    ,trip_distance
    ,RatecodeID
    ,store_and_fwd_flag
    ,PULocationID
    ,DOLocationID
    ,payment_type
    ,fare_amount
    ,extra
    ,mta_tax
    ,tip_amount
    ,tolls_amount
    ,improvement_surcharge
    ,total_amount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/yellow_tripdata_2017-01.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = true
    ) AS [result]
